title: Vegetarian Hotpot!
directions: • dice the onion and mushroom, and fry off together. Set aside
• very thinly slice potatoes to cover the top of the baking dish you are using. Boil for about 5 minutes, until just softening, then drain and set aside.
• cook the sweetcorn as required - it's fine to use frozen and do it in the microwave!
• cook the lentils for 5 minutes in a pan of water, then drain.
• add the mushrooms, onion, sweetcorn and beans.
• stir through the stock and allow to bubble slightly, then add the tinned soup
• mix everything well, and simmer for 5 minutes
• transfer to an oven proof dish and top with the sliced potatoes
• place in the oven for approximately 20 minutes, until bubbling and the potatoes are going golden
ingredients: • potatoes to top - use enough to cover your baking dish
